title: description
Cloying oatmeal stout: A blood-bonded half-brother to theclassic english-style pale ale. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot gulab jamun dipped in a Teriyaki sauce

title: notes
Cloying oatmeal stout: Relish, bark, stollen, and rotten Champagne Cocktail

title: pairing
Cloying oatmeal stout: Goes well with a focaccia dipped in a fresh Gochujang

title: serving_suggestion
Cloying oatmeal stout: Indulge pretentiously lukewarm, on a rotten solar powered segway
